# Make sure that `mclapply` does not cause problems


```{r}
source("get-dataset.r")
```

```{r}
library(meffil)
basenames <- meffil.basenames(path)
options(mc.cores=10)
B.1 <- meffil.normalize.dataset(filenames=basenames)
```

```{r}
norm.objects <- mclapply(basenames, meffil.compute.normalization.object)
norm.objects <- meffil.normalize.objects(norm.objects, number.pcs=2)
B.2<- meffil.normalize.samples(norm.objects)
```

```{r}
quantile(B.1-B.2, na.rm=T)
```
